title: Night mode keeps turning on, even when set to Always Off . constantly need to go into Search in sett
content: Pixel XL suddenly had dark mode for phone and messages. In settings for phone the control was visible but not accessible to turn off. Assume this activated after an upgrade???Found an instruction to get into developer mode and located an option to have "Always Off", but have to set this back 4-6 times per day. Putting me off staying with pixel
